review: This item has serious flaws. The item does not have the capacity to retain Wifi connection for more that 5 min. If you call customer service they will robotically try to troubleshoot it. asking you to do ridiculous things like unplugging it, connecting it to the extender or turning off everything in your house that is connected to Wi-Fi. I had this problem on two devices I bought one, it did not work, the replacement did not work either. Do not waste your money on this Garbage.

review: I like getting my prime video, but still have to use my Chromecast, and in fact my chromecast is used more. Since my TV only has one USB, the chromecast wins. Why? Youtube. Fire TV stick will not play it. I am a heavy Netflix user, light Prime User. If you are a heavy Prime Video User, this is 5 stars all the way for you. The setup is easy and intuitive. The device is sleek. Nice work Amazon. Great product. I bought mine on sale for $39 (pre-release I think). I would hate to pay more than that for this, but again, I like Chromecast better.
